name: The Faraday Centre, Hawke's Bay - East Coast  Museum of Technology & Science Centre
telephone: Hon. Curator, Dave Prebensen 64 6 844 7468, Faraday Centre 64 6 835 2338
openingHours: Понедельникам, средам и пятницам 9 утра до 1 pm и суббота 9 утра до 11: 30 утра за исключением Рождества.

offers.description: Adults $7.00, Children $1.00. Special times and Costs can be arranged for School classes and group tours.
